tier.item: (60) rí do.rigni (-gne MS) [aéar n-úar ocus tene réi l
Finite and non-finite conjuncts in Welsh
kin g has.made air. cold.ACC and fire clear
In a sequence of coordinate clauses, only the verbal head contained in the
first conjunct, the specifier, is morphologically specified for tense, per-
son, and number, the followin g ones containing a verbal noun instead of
'The Kin g made the col d air, and the clear red fire, and the
an inflected form, thus behaving lik e complements.
